messages.message: @paul @dlluncor thanks fo notifying! our docker containers do not have sudo on the base image. So this should not be a problem, but we will run the images through security scans to make sure its not missed.

just for confirming, I tried replicating this on our build machine -
```
sudeep@build-machine-v17-09-26:~$ sudo -u#-1 id -u
0
sudeep@build-machine-v17-09-26:~$ id -u
1018
sudeep@build-machine-v17-09-26:~$ sudo -u#4294967295 id -u
0
```
